title: Blomstertid
overview: Blomstertid is a mockumentary series where the filmmaker Martin Persson plays the documentary filmer with the same name. He follows and documents three boys--Kenneth, Steven and Anders--as all of the figures were written by Peter Magnusson during their school time in Bromma in spring 1994 and 14 years later. Three different lifestyles that are intertwined and depicted with both gravity and humor.
